title: HR Manager 2.2.3.3
description:
**COMPANY OVERVIEW:**
DentistFind is a leading dental marketing platform committed to empowering dental practices to grow efficiently and sustainably. By integrating innovative technology with personalized consultation, we provide dental professionals with the resources and expertise needed to excel.
Our intuitive app offers real\-time insights, actionable reports, and performance evaluations. Our expert consultants deliver tailored training and support, emphasizing ease of use and collaboration. At DentistFind, we pride ourselves on fostering a culture of innovation, inclusivity, and continuous improvement, enabling our clients to focus on delivering exceptional patient care.**WHY JOIN US?*** Innovative Environment: Be part of a forward\-thinking team where your input drives real change.
* Career Growth: Access clear development pathways and opportunities to advance.
* Remote Flexibility: Enjoy the benefits of a flexible work schedule and the ability to work from anywhere.
* Inclusive Culture: Join a diverse and supportive workplace committed to collaboration and inclusivity.

**JOB OVERVIEW:**
As the HR Manager, you will be a pivotal force in shaping the future of DentistFind. Your primary mission is to align our human resource strategies with our overarching business goals, ensuring we attract, develop, and retain top talent. This role requires a proactive approach to drive strategic HR initiatives that foster a thriving company culture and organizational success.**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:*** Collaborate with leadership to develop and execute a comprehensive HR and talent strategy that aligns with business objectives.
* Lead the talent acquisition process, from strategic planning to recruitment and onboarding, ensuring a seamless candidate experience.
* Champion company culture and standards, facilitating programs that enhance employee engagement and retention.
* Design and implement training and development initiatives that promote professional growth and cultural alignment.
* Oversee and refine HR policies, procedures, and systems to maintain a productive and compliant work environment.
* Provide expert guidance and support to managers and staff on complex HR matters, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
* Develop and monitor HR metrics to inform strategic decisions and forecast hiring needs.
* Drive performance management processes that encourage high performance and accountability.

**REQUIRED SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS:*** Proven experience as an HR Manager or similar role with a strategic focus.
* Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and make informed decisions.
* Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with a focus on collaboration and inclusivity.
* Ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and processes.
* Experience in a dynamic, fast\-paced environment, demonstrating leadership and decision\-making capabilities.
* Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Psychology, or a related field.

**Additional Information:*** Position: Full\-time, Remote
* Schedule: Monday \- Friday, with flexible working hours between 6am \- 6pm EST
* Note: This role requires comfort with using a time tracking tool.


Join us at DentistFind and contribute to a vibrant and forward\-thinking workplace where your impact is valued, and your career can flourish. Apply now to be part of our journey!

title: IT Operations Procurement Assistant
description:
The International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) is a not\-for\-profit institution that generates agricultural innovations to meet Africa’s most pressing challenges of hunger, malnutrition, poverty, and natural resource degradation. Working with various partners across sub\-Saharan Africa, we improve livelihoods, enhance food and nutrition security, increase employment, and preserve natural resource integrity. IITA is a member of CGIAR, a global agriculture research partnership for a food secure future.


We are recruiting to fill the position below:


**Job Position: IT Operations Procurement Assistant**


**Job Location:** Ibadan, Oyo  

Employment Type: Contract  

Duration: 3\-year renewable contract  



  

**Duties**


* Adopt ITIL best practice, to handle all IT procurement\-related requests and inquiries efficiently through the Service Desk via telephone, email, the (CRM) end\-user portal (Freshworks) or the electronic shop to ensure all user requests and needs are handled courteously, promptly, and effectively.
* Respond to IT procurement request with a high level of accuracy, ensuring seamless coordination with the Supply Chain for timely processing and fulfillment.
* Assist the Manager, ITSM in overseeing and managing IT stocks level, ensuring timely replenishment of suppliers to prevent shortages.
* Support the Manager, ITSM in generating monthly procurement reports, covering stock levels, replenishments, and sales.
* Use data insights to advise the Head of Unit on procurement trends and needs.
* Perform desktop fixes, including software installations, system configurations, endpoint protection systems updates, and application upgrades to maintain operational efficiency.
* Maintain accurate documentation of hardware failures, repairs, installations, and removal, escalating issues to Supervisor as needed.
* Ensure the IT asset register remains up\-to\-date and the disposals comply IITA Disposal Strategy.
* Act as a liaison between Supply Chain representatives, external IT vendors, and service providers for procurement of IT consumables and supplies.
* Assist in patching computers, peripherals, printers, A/V systems, and software applications (e.g. upgrade and patch management, etc.) to ensure all systems remain updated and fully functional.
* Perform any other duties as may be assigned by the Supervisor.


**Requirements**  

Qualification:


* BSc / HND in Computer Science / Engineering, Electrical / Mechanical Engineering, Information Technology or other engineering\-related courses.
* The ideal candidate must have a minimum of two (2\) years’ experience performing a similar role in a well\-structured environment.
* Professional certifications in Service Management (CompTIA, ITIL, MCP, MCTS, and Programming Language) is required.


Competencies:  

The ideal candidate must:


* Be able to command excellent client relation and management skills.
* Have experience in IT Procurement and assets management.
* Have sound knowledge Microsoft Client Technologies Management (Wins 7,8,10,11\).
* Have good interpersonal and client relations skills.


**Benefits**


* We offer highly competitive salary with equally attractive benefits and excellent working conditions in a pleasant campus environment.

title: Security Officers

title: .Net C# Developer Trainee (March 2025)
description:
Bincom Dev Center is a leading tech talent development and solutions platform with multiple locations. We are currently seeking a skilled C\# developer to join our team and work on code and .NET solutions for our company. The developer will play a crucial role in designing, writing, and maintaining C\# code for both our current and future projects. The qualified candidate will also actively participate in design and planning discussions, contributing to the development of innovative solutions for coding problems.

This is 1\-year internship position with the potential for conversion to an Associate position upon successful completion and a strong performance assessment. As part of the internship, candidates will undergo an intensive training program to enhance their skills. Once trained, they will be assigned to various project teams where they will contribute to the conception, development, and support of software solutions.

This position is ideal for students who are currently seeking a place to undertake their Industrial Attachment Training for either 6 months or 1 year. It is also suitable for fresh graduates, NYSC Corpers seeking a Place of Primary Assignment, post\-NYSC job seekers, and individuals who are passionate about building a successful career in software development.

Responsibilities

* Develop and implement management systems by working on scheduling and reporting activities
* \- Create efficient and effective C\# / .Net solutions and services
* \- Design feature\-rich scheduling, tracking, and reporting solutions
* \- Identify and address technical risks and difficulties, proposing effective solution strategies
* \- Integrate and test new features in various applications
* \- Maintain regular communication and collaborate closely with team members throughout the development process
* \- Write clean, scalable, and reliable C\# code
* \- Coordinate and provide progress updates to the Project Manager's team and other developers

Required

* \-Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
* \- 0 or 1 year of experience as a C\# developer
* \- Ability to collaborate effectively within a development team
* \- Basic knowledge of full\-stack development
* \- Proficiency in technologies such as MVC/C\#, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and SQL databases
* \- Adaptability to a multicultural environment
* \- Fluent in English with strong interpersonal skills

**Benefits**

Accepted persons will be given an automatic FULL scholarship to a relevant Bincom Academy Class. A certificate of participation in a Bincom Academy class (or equivalent prior knowledge of the same) is required to be considered for an Internship placement.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent, Internship, New grad

Pay: ₦50,000\.00 per month

title: Communications Officer
description:
Africa Farming Innovations (AFI) is a ground breaking initiative bringing together the Oyo State Government, local Farmers’ Cooperatives, the Local Solutions International (LSI) a US 501 (3\) (c) nonprofit, tax\-exempt organisation, and the International Centre for Migration Policy Development (ICMPD), an intergovernmental organisation based in Vienna Austria. AFI aims to promote innovative and sustainable agricultural practices that empower rural communities, especially the youth. At AFI, we focus on integrating cutting\-edge solutions to address key challenges in agriculture, climate resilience, and youth unemployment in Nigeria.


We are recruiting to fill the position below:


**Job Position: Communications Officer**  



  

**Job Location:** Ibadan, Oyo  

Employment Type: Full\-time  

Vacancy No: NGSW/2025/YERP/003  

Type of Contract: Service Contract \- Open to Nigerian Nationals only  

Duration: One year, with possibility of renewal \- subject to funding availability


**Functional Responsibilities**


* Develop and execute communication strategies, plans, and campaigns to effectively convey the organization's messages, values, and priorities to internal and external audiences.
* Write, edit, and produce a variety of communication materials, including press releases, articles, newsletters, reports, speeches, presentations, and website content, ensuring accuracy, clarity, and consistency in messaging.
* Manage communication channels and platforms, including websites, social media, email newsletters, and multimedia channels, to engage stakeholders and amplify key messages.
* Monitor media coverage and public perception of the organization, tracking mentions, trends, and sentiment, and providing regular reports and analysis to inform communication efforts.
* Cultivate relationships with media outlets, journalists, bloggers, and influencers, pitching stories, arranging interviews, and coordinating media coverage to increase visibility and positive publicity.
* Respond to inquiries, requests, and feedback from stakeholders, including employees, partners, and the public, providing timely and accurate information and managing issues or crises as needed.
* Develop and maintain communication materials and resources, such as branding guidelines, messaging frameworks, and communication templates, to ensure consistency and alignment across all communication channels.
* Coordinate internal communication initiatives, including staff briefings, to inform, engage, and motivate employees and foster a culture of transparency and engagement.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams, to align communication efforts with organizational goals and priorities.
* Plan and execute events, conferences, and public relations activities to showcase the organization's achievements, initiatives, and thought leadership in relevant industry sectors or communities.
* Conduct research and analysis to identify communication trends, audience preferences, and best practices, incorporating insights and feedback into communication strategies and tactics.
* Coordinate with external agencies, consultants, and vendors, such as graphic designers, photographers, and printers, to support communication projects and initiatives.
* Train and support staff, volunteers, or spokespeople in effective communication techniques, media relations, and crisis communication protocols, ensuring readiness and confidence in representing the organization.
* Evaluate the effectiveness of communication initiatives and campaigns, using metrics and analytics to measure reach, engagement, and impact, and making data\-driven recommendations for improvement.
* Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and communication tools and platforms, continuously learning and adapting strategies to optimize communication effectiveness and efficiency.


**Requirements and Qualifications**


* Bachelor's Degree in Communications, Public Relations, Journalism, Marketing, or a related field; master's degree or professional certification is a plus.
* 8 years of proven experience in corporate communications, public relations, media relations, or related roles, with a track record of success in developing and implementing communication strategies and campaigns.
* Excellent writing, editing, and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft clear, compelling messages tailored to different audiences and communication channels.
* Strong storytelling ability, with the creativity and imagination to translate complex concepts and information into engaging narratives and content.
* Proficiency in digital communication tools and platforms, including social media, content management systems, email marketing software, and analytics tools.
* Knowledge of media relations practices, including pitching, press release writing, and media monitoring, with a network of media contacts and relationships.
* Strategic thinking and problem\-solving skills, with the ability to analyze situations, anticipate challenges, and develop effective communication strategies and solutions.
* Collaboration and teamwork abilities, with experience working cross\-functionally and managing relationships with diverse stakeholders, both internally and externally.
* Attention to detail and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects, deadlines, and priorities in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment.
* Adaptability and flexibility in responding to changing priorities, crises, and opportunities, with a calm and professional demeanor under pressure.


Required Skills:


* Strategic communication
* Writing and editing
* Media relations
* Digital communication
* Storytelling
* Collaboration
* Problem\-solving
* Project management
* Analytical skills
* Adaptability.


**Salary**  

N350,000 monthly.


**Method of Application**  

Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Application documents to AFI Cooperative via: **HRM@aficoop.org** using the Job Position as the subject of the email.


**Application Documents**  

The application documents should include:


* Letter of interest clearly stating suitability for the position;
* Detailed curriculum vitae based on the criteria stated above.
* Degree Certificates.


**Note**


* Failure to submit supporting documents as specified in the advertisement will result in an incomplete application. Applicants who submit incomplete applications will NOT be considered.
* Due to the high volume of applications, only pre\-selected candidates will be contacted.
* Do not send more thank one application.

* This will involve ensuring team members can collaborate, work efficiently, and have the necessary tools to meet project implementation deadlines.


Project Assistant's primary duties:


* Creating timelines, milestones, and deliverables to contribute to effective project planning
* Following up on the progress of action items and other tasks and reporting to the project manager
* Supporting team members in completing their tasks to ensure they meet milestones
* Scheduling meetings, conference calls, and project\-related events with team members
* Observing the team's performance and providing detailed updates to the project manager
* Assisting in the preparation of project presentations and reports for senior managers
* Updating and organizing project files, such as meeting minutes and progress reports
* Using project management software to maintain charters and process flows
* Assisting in risk mitigation, identification, tracking, management, and resolution
* Cresearch and gathering data to support project initiatives and encourage good decision\-making practices
* Assisting the project manager with budgeting, logging expenses, and filing petty cash reports
* facilitating communication among team members and liaising with the project manager
* Providing administrative support to project teams when necessary
* Seeking opportunities for process improvements and making recommendations
* writing and distributing project\-related messages, such as memos and status updates
* Collaborating with cross\-functional teams that include a diverse range of personalities and skills.


**Requirements and Qualifications**


* Bachelor's degree in relevant field; master's degree is a plus.
* 4 years of proven experience in project management support.
* Critical thinking and problem\-solving skills, with the ability to analyze situations, anticipate challenges, and develop effective solutions.
* Collaboration and teamwork abilities, with experience working cross\-functionally and managing relationships with diverse stakeholders, both internally and externally.
* Attention to detail and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects, deadlines, and priorities in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment.
* Adaptability and flexibility in responding to changing priorities, crises, and opportunities, with a calm and professional demeanor under pressure.


Required Skills:


* Collaboration
* Problem\-solving
* Project management
* Analytical skills
* Adaptability


**Remuneration**  

N250,000 Monthly.


**Method of Application**  

Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Application documents to AFI Cooperative via: **\[email protected]** using the Job Position as the subject of the email.


**Application Documents**  

The application documents should include:


* Letter of interest clearly stating suitability for the position;
* Detailed curriculum vitae based on the criteria stated above.
* Degree Certificates.


**Note**


* Failure to submit supporting documents as specified in the advertisement will result in an incomplete application. Applicants who submit incomplete applications will NOT be considered.
* Due to the high volume of applications, only pre\-selected candidates will be contacted.
* Do not send more thank one application.

title: Flutter Mobile App Developer
description:
**Technical Skills**

1\. **Proficiency in Dart:** Strong knowledge of the Dart programming language, which is used for Flutter development.

2\. **Flutter Framework:** Experience with the Flutter framework for building natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

3\. **UI/UX Design:** Ability to design and implement user interfaces using Flutter’s widget system.

4\. **State Management:** Experience with state management solutions (e.g., Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, or Redux).

5\. **APIs and Integration:** Proficiency in integrating RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and other services.

6\. **Version Control:** Familiarity with version control systems like Git.

7\. **Testing:** Knowledge of testing frameworks and tools (e.g., unit tests, widget tests).

8\. **Databases:** Experience with local databases (e.g., SQLite, Hive) and cloud databases (e.g., Firebase).

**Soft Skills**

1\. **Problem\-Solving:** Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills.

2\. **Communication:** Effective verbal and written communication skills.

3\. **Collaboration:** Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

4\. **Adaptability:** Ability to adapt to new technologies and tools quickly.

**Experience and Education**

1\. Ex**perience:** Typically 1\-3 years of experience in mobile app development, with a focus on Flutter.

2\. **Portfolio:** A portfolio of Flutter applications demonstrating your skills and experience.

3\. **Education:** A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is often preferred but not always required but added advantage.

**Additional Requirements**

1\. **Knowledge of Android and iOS Platforms**: Understanding the specifics of both Android and iOS platforms.

2\. **Performance Optimization:** Experience with optimizing app performance and handling complex UI requirements.

3\. **Deployment**: Knowledge of app deployment processes for both Android (Google Play Store) and iOS (Apple App Store).

**Desirable Skills**

1\. **Experience with Other Frameworks:** Knowledge of other mobile development frameworks (e.g., React Native) is a plus.

2\. **Experience with CI/CD:** Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) tools.

3\. **Open Source Contribution**: Contribution to open\-source Flutter projects can be a strong plus.

Job Types: Full\-time, Temporary, Contract  
Contract length: 3 months

Pay: ₦70,000\.00 \- ₦200,000\.00 per month

how many did you have?

title: Virtual Podcast Host & Interviewer
description:
UGC Deck is a content creation agency that helps businesses and entrepreneurs leverage User\-Generated Content (UGC), influencer marketing, video editing and educational videos to grow their brands.

We are launching a structured interview\-style video podcast to build the personal brand of our founder and discuss UGC marketing, entrepreneurship, and business growth.

**Job Overview:**  
We are looking for a charismatic and engaging Podcast Host to lead our video podcast interviews.

The host will guide structured conversations exclusively with our founder, ensuring insightful, dynamic, and value\-driven discussions. This is a great opportunity for someone passionate about business, marketing, and media.

**Responsibilities:**

* Act as the face and voice of the podcast, guiding structured interviews with the founder.
* Research and prepare for interviews to ask compelling questions.
* Engage with the founder in a professional, friendly, and conversational manner.
* Ensure a smooth and natural flow of discussions while keeping the content aligned with the brand’s goals.
* Collaborate with the production team to ensure high\-quality recordings.
* Promote podcast episodes on social media and other relevant platforms (optional but preferred).

**Requirements:**

* Prior experience in hosting, interviewing, or public speaking (preferred but not required).
* Strong communication skills and the ability to engage an audience.
* Comfortable on camera and able to maintain a professional yet relatable presence.
* Passionate about entrepreneurship, marketing, and business growth.
* Ability to research topics and prepare discussion points.
* Availability for scheduled recordings (virtual, pre\-recorded format).

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Background in media, journalism, communications, or a related field.
* Experience in podcasting, YouTube hosting, or live streaming.
* Familiarity with UGC marketing, social media trends, or content creation.

**How to Apply:**  
If you’re interested in becoming the face of an exciting business podcast, we’d love to hear from you.

Please submit your application with the following:

* A short video (2\-5 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining why you’d be a great host. The video should be uploaded to **Google Drive**, with settings changed to **'Anyone can view'**, and the shareable link included in your application.
* Your resume or portfolio showcasing any relevant experience.

Join us in creating a valuable and engaging podcast that builds the personal brand of our founder and empowers entrepreneurs and business owners.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₦80,000\.00 \- ₦100,000\.00 per month

Language:

* English (Preferred)

title: Chemical Formulation Engineer
description:
**JOB PURPOSE:**

The Chemical Formulation Engineer will play a key role in developing and optimizing chemical formulations for our company ensuring that products meet quality standards, regulatory requirements, and performance expectations. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting\-edge formulations and contribute to the development of high\-quality products.

**KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES**

· Develop and optimize chemical formulations for a wide range of products, ensuring high performance, safety, and compliance with industry standards.

· Conduct experiments to assess the stability, compatibility, and efficacy of formulations.

· Perform scale\-up processes from laboratory to production levels, ensuring smooth transition and minimal production issues.

· Collaborate with cross\-functional teams, including quality control, production, and regulatory departments, to ensure formulations meet product specifications and regulatory requirements.

· Analyze raw materials and their effects on final formulations to ensure cost\-effectiveness and sustainability.

· Conduct testing and analyze data to ensure products meet quality standards, including physical, chemical, and sensory properties.

· Troubleshoot formulation challenges and resolve technical issues during the development and manufacturing stages.

· Stay up to date with advancements in chemical formulation technologies, regulations, and industry trends.

· Prepare technical documentation, including product specifications, test methods, and formulation records.

· Provide technical support to manufacturing and quality assurance teams to ensure product consistency and address any formulation\-related issues.

· Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental regulations in the formulation process.

**EXPERIENCE:**

Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in chemical formulation development, with a strong background in chemical industry.

**EDUCATION AND CERTIFICATION:**

Bachelor’s degree/HND in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Chemical Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). A master’s degree would be an added advantage.

**JOB SPECIFIC SKILLS:**

· In\-depth knowledge of chemical properties, raw materials, and processing techniques.

· Experience with laboratory equipment, testing methodologies, and statistical analysis tools.

· Strong problem\-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex formulation challenges.

· Detail\-oriented with a focus on accuracy and precision in experimentation and documentation.

· Familiarity with regulatory standards.

· Must possess in\-depth knowledge of Microsoft Office tools, specifically Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with team members and other departments.

**SALARY \& BENEFITS:**

**Very attractive.**

Job Type: Full\-time

title: CREDIT OFFICER
description:
Delight Fund Initiative Nigeria is an investment company, and our principal activities include Lending, venture capitalist and microfinance.

DELIGHT FUND INITIATIVE NIGERIA is seeking a credit officer to facilitate lending for our clients by assessing creditworthiness and processing relevant documents in IBADAN.

RESPONSIBILITIES OF CREDIT OFFICER.

Credit Officer responsibilities include preparing loan applications, evaluating clients’ financial information and Risk analysis. To be successful in this role, you should have a good understanding of lending procedures and customer service experience.

Ultimately, you will help our clients acquire loans in a timely manner, while ensuring that all requirements are met.

Credit officer shall:\-

Review loan requests

Assess clients’ financial status

Evaluate creditworthiness and risks.

Contact clients to gather financial data and documentation

Analyse risks and approve or reject loan requests

Set up payment plans

Maintain updated records of loan applications

Follow up with clients about loan renewals

Monitor progress of existing loans

Daily \& weekly repayment collection

REQUIREMENTS AND SKILLS

Proven work experience as a Credit Officer, Loan Officer or similar role

Hands\-on experience with lending procedures and products

Ability to create and process financial spreadsheets

Strong analytical skills

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Customer service experience and conflict resolution skill

NCE/OND/HND/BSc in Banking and Finance, Economics or related field

BENEFITS:

Housing Allowance

Performance Bonus

Office Allowance

Monthly Dividend

Starting Salary: 80,000

Flexible working hour

Yearly appraisal

Timely Salary Review base on performance

title: HR Admin Assistant
description:
Royal Teesquare Trade and Investment Limited is a company that specializes in importation and marketing of tailor\-made products in the agricultural sector of the economy. Started in the year 2019 as an off\-shoot of Amarshal South based in Ibadan, by developing her own brands towards meeting users demand for effective, quality, ease to use and Affordable agrochemicals and agro allied products with technical support.


The brands quickly gain market acceptance as it meets users expectations, becoming a notable brand in the agro sector.


We are recruiting to fill the position below:  

  

**Job Position: HR Admin Assistant**  

**Job Location:** Ibadan, Oyo  

Employment Type: Full\-time  



  

**Job** **Description**


* We are looking to employ an HR/Admin assistant with outstanding administrative and communication skills. An HR assistant is expected to be a conceptual thinker with superb organizational and time management skills.
* You must be reliable and should accurately follow instructions with the ability to multitask and acclimatize to a fast\-paced environment.
* Top candidates will be superb at problem\-solving, efficient in scheduling, and precise in the recruitment process.


**Responsibilities**


* Support all internal and external HR\-related inquiries or requests.
* Maintain digital and electronic records of employees.
* Serve as point of contact with benefit vendors and administrators.
* Assist with the recruitment process by identifying candidates, performing reference checks, and issuing employment contracts.
* Maintain calendars of the HR management team.
* Oversee the completion of compensation and benefit documentation.
* Assist with performance management procedures.
* Process payroll and resolve any payroll errors.
* Complete termination paperwork and exit interviews.
* Schedule meetings, interviews, HR events and maintain agendas.
* Coordinate training sessions and seminars.
* Perform orientations and update records of new staff.
* Produce and submit reports on general HR activity.
* Keep up\-to\-date with the latest HR trends and best practices.


**Requirements**


* Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources or related fields (essential).
* 1/3 years of experience as an HR assistant (essential).
* Exposure to labor law and employment equity regulations.
* Effective HR administration and people management skills.
* Exposure to payroll practices.
* Full understanding of HR functions and best practices.

title: MATRON – IBADAN
description:
* Monitor and ensure high standards of nursing and clinical services are maintained in accordance with internationally acceptable policies and procedures.
* Supervise nursing staff and ensure adherence to healthcare protocols and best practices.
* Take the lead and coordinate action in maintenance of high standards of cleanliness across the areas of responsibility.
* Ensure the environment is fit for patience, care, and recovery. Oversee patient care delivery, ensuring safety, hygiene, and quality standards are maintained.
* Demonstrate autonomy and expertise in the delivery of patient care.Promote patient\-centered care and address concerns to improve service delivery.
* Supervise and ensure peri\-operative nursing procedures are carried out in accordance with international standard of infection prevention and control.
* Antenatal care for all pregnant women, ensuring early detection and timely intervention of pregnancy\-related illnesses and safe delivery. Management of pregnant women, labor, and postnatal care.
* Ensure access to family planning services to all women of reproductive age, including adolescents, and provide the opportunity to make the right decision by choice and not by chance, including youth\-friendly health services.
* Creation of awareness on all reproductive health care services, including family planning methods. Educate patients and staff on modern contraceptive methods, reproductive health, and maternal well\-being.
* Adhere to national policies and protocols for family planning services. Ensure compliance with national policies and protocols on family planning.
* Interface with a multidisciplinary team to diversify the uptake of family planning services. Work with multi\-disciplinary teams to integrate family planning into broader healthcare services.
* Keep in line with the national standard of documentation and audit of family planning commodities using the NHIS tools.
* Implement staff development programs and ensure competency
* Lead, mentor, and support nursing teams to enhance professional growth.
* Conduct training programs on nursing best practices, emergency care, and reproductive health.
* Monitor staff performance and address any professional development needs.
* Fostering a positive work environment and addressing staff concerns
* Ensure nursing documentation and patient records are accurate and up\-to\-date.
* Enforce hospital policies, ethical standards, and regulatory compliance.
* Coordinate with management on resource allocation, budgeting, and supply management.
* Participate in healthcare audits and quality improvement initiatives.
* Ensure compliance with regulatory standard and policies
* Promote patient education on health, wellness, and disease prevention.
* Advocate for community outreach programs on maternal health and family planning.
* Collaborate with external agencies for continuous healthcare improvements.
* Promote patient\-centered care and address patient concerns.

  


**Specific Responsibilities**
-----------------------------


* Patient Care


* Family Planning Services \& Reproductive Health Services


* Staff Supervision \& Development


* Administration \& Compliance


* Patient \& Community Engagement


**Required Experience**
-----------------------


* **Education:** Registered Nurse (RN), Registered Midwife (RM) with a Bachelor’s Degree in Nursing. A Master’s Degree will be an added advantage.
* **Experience:** Minimum of 15 years in nursing, with at least 7 years in a supervisory or managerial role. **Experience in reproductive health and family planning is mandatory.**
* **Certifications:** **BLS, ACLS,** valid NMCN license, and certification in family planning or reproductive health services is an advantage.
* Skills:
	+ Strong leadership and organizational skills.
	+ Excellent communication and patient education abilities.
	+ Knowledge of modern family planning methods and healthcare policies.
	+ Ability to manage teams, resolve conflicts, and ensure high standards of care.
**Minimum Qualifications**
--------------------------


* **Education:** Registered Nurse (RN), Registered Midwife (RM) with a Bachelor’s Degree in Nursing. A Master’s Degree will be an added advantage.
* **Experience:** Minimum of 15 years in nursing, with at least 7 years in a supervisory or managerial role. **Experience in reproductive health and family planning is mandatory.**

title: Dispatch Rider
description:
**Job Description:**

The Dispatch Rider will be responsible for the safe, timely, and accurate delivery of food orders to customers, ensuring an excellent customer experience. The rider will adhere to company policies and ensure deliveries are carried out professionally and efficiently, contributing to the overall success of Bankyloolas.

**Key Responsibilities:**

· Deliver food orders promptly and accurately to customers.

· Ensure all deliveries are made within specified time frames and report any delays.

· Verify the accuracy of orders with the customer before departing for delivery.

· Maintain professional and courteous interaction with customers at all times.

· Handle customer complaints and queries with empathy and escalate as necessary.

· Provide a positive customer experience, ensuring satisfaction at every point of contact.

· Adhere to all company policies and procedures.

· Maintain a professional appearance and demeanor.

· Uphold the integrity and reputation of Bankyloolas.

· Follow the standard process flow for deliveries.

· Utilize designated tools and apps to track deliveries and update statuses.

· Report daily activities, including delivery times and customer feedback, to the Admin Officer.

· Attend review meetings twice a month to discuss performance and improvements.

**Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):**

1\. Percentage of orders delivered within specified time frames.

2\. Percentage of orders delivered without discrepancies (e.g., wrong items, incomplete orders).

3\. Customer feedback and ratings regarding delivery experience, communication, and professionalism.

4\. Number of deliveries made per month, with targets set at 200 deliveries for full salary and bonus eligibility for over 300 deliveries.

5\. Rider’s ability to minimize operational costs and maintain a good performance rating.

6\. Compliance with company policies, traffic rules, and delivery process flow.

7\. The speed and quality of resolving customer complaints or queries, ensuring customer satisfaction.

8\. Reporting and updating delivery status accurately and on time.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: From ₦70,000\.00 per month

Experience:

* driving and dispatch riding: 2 years (Required)

License/Certification:

* Driver's License (Required)

Application Deadline: 01/04/2025  
Expected Start Date: 15/04/2025

title: Product and Operations Lead
description:
**SUMMARY:**

**Product and Operations Lead**

Soupah Farm\-en\-Market Limited is a fast\-growing technology company delivering solutions to urban farmers and agribusinesses in emerging markets.

We are focused on revolutionizing the agricultural sector through cutting\-edge technology, sustainable practices, and data\-driven solutions. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a **Product and Operations Lead** to join our dynamic team and drive the successful implementation of our products and operational strategies.

**Role Overview:** The **Product and Operations Lead** will play a pivotal role in the development, execution, and optimization of both our product offerings and internal operations. This role requires a strategic thinker who is passionate about technology solutions and can effectively balance product innovation with operational excellence. You will work closely with internal and external cross\-functional teams to ensure our products meet the needs of customers and stakeholders while maintaining seamless business operations.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Product Strategy \& Development**: Lead the product lifecycle from ideation to launch, ensuring the development of high\-quality, customer\-centric agritech solutions. Collaborate with product managers and engineers to translate customer feedback and market trends into actionable product features.
* **Operational Leadership**: Oversee day\-to\-day operations, ensuring the company’s workflows, processes, and resources are aligned with the mission and strategic goals.
* **Cross\-Functional Collaboration**: Work with marketing, sales, and customer support teams to ensure alignment between product development and customer needs. Act as the bridge between product teams and operational teams to ensure smooth execution.
* **Data\-Driven Decision Making**: Utilize data and key performance indicators (KPIs) to guide decision\-making, improve product performance, and streamline operations. Continuously assess product and operational performance to identify areas for improvement.
* **Sustainability Focus**: Ensure that product development and operations are in line with sustainable agricultural practices, contributing to both the growth of the company and positive environmental impact.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, Agriculture, or a related field
* 2\+ years of experience in product management, operations, or a similar role, ideally within the agritech, ecommerce, technology, or sustainability sectors.
* Strong understanding of the agricultural industry, including the challenges and opportunities in modern farming.
* Proven ability to lead product development processes, from concept to delivery, in an agile environment.
* Demonstrated experience in optimizing operational workflows, supply chain management, and resource allocation.
* Strong data analysis and problem\-solving skills, with proficiency in using tools like Excel, Google Analytics, or any project management software.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross\-functional teams and stakeholders.
* A passion for sustainability, with a desire to drive meaningful change in agriculture.

**How to Apply:** Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they’re passionate about joining our agritech team to career@soupah.africa

**Application Deadline:**

**15th March, 2025**

Job Type: Hybrid

Application Deadline: 15/03/2025

Job Type: Full\-time

Job Type: Full\-time

title: Bookstore Manager
description:
Are you a passionate book lover? Do you thrive in the cozy ambiance of a bookstore? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

**Position:** Bookstore manager  
**Location:** Wuse II, Abuja  
**Working Hours:** 9:00 AM \- 6:00 PM, Mondays \- Fridays; \& 10am\-5pm Saturdays

**Position Overview:** The Bookstore Manager oversees the day\-to\-day operations of the bookstore, ensuring efficient functioning and exceptional customer service. Responsible for managing inventory, supervising staff, maintaining financial records, and fostering a positive work environment.

**Business/ Customer Experience Management**

* Attend to walk\-in customers and ease them through their shopping experience.
* Ensure that customers receive prompt and courteous service at all times.
* Address customer inquiries, complaints, and feedback professionally.
* Foster a customer\-centric culture among staff members.
* Conduct studies and research to discover new techniques necessary for improving customer experience, train the team, and implement best practices to engage walk\-in customers.
* Develop metrics to measure customer satisfaction and collect data. Embed them into team members' performance management, provide feedback, and report performance to the leadership team.
* Ensure the bookstore maintains a clean, organized, and visually appealing environment.

**Operations and Inventory management**

* Monitor and maintain appropriate levels of inventory to meet customer demand.
* Coordinate with the Inventory Team to ensure timely replenishment of stock.
* Implement inventory control measures to minimize shrinkage and losses

**Business Development**

* Provide market feedback to the leadership team regarding competitive offerings based on insights gleaned from interacting with walk\-in customers.
* Generate product development ideas to boost in\-store sales and support the development and marketing of in\-store literary events.
* Utilize social media platforms like Whatsapp and other marketing channels to drive customer engagement and sales.
* Monitor the effectiveness of marketing initiatives and adjust strategies as needed.
* Foster positive relationships with the local community, schools, libraries, and literary organizations.
* Participate in community events, book fairs, and fundraisers to promote the bookstore and encourage literacy initiatives.
* Collaborate with local authors, educators, and book clubs to host literary events and book discussions.
* Support the implementation of expansion plans and new outlet development.

**Financial Management:**

* Monitor sales performance and analyze financial reports to identify trends and opportunities for improvement.
* Develop and implement strategies to achieve sales targets and maximize profitability.
* Manage cash handling procedures and reconcile daily sales transactions.
* Develop and manage the bookstore budget, including revenue projections, expenses, and cost control measures.
* Monitor financial performance, analyze variances, and implement strategies to optimize profitability.
* Review invoices, purchase orders, and financial reports to ensure accuracy and compliance with budgetary guidelines.

**Facility Maintenance, Safety \& Compliance:**

* Maintain the physical condition of the bookstore, including cleanliness, organization, and repairs.
* Schedule routine maintenance tasks, such as AC servicing, plumbing, and electrical work.
* Ensure compliance with safety regulations and implement measures to prevent accidents and hazards.
* Coordinate with vendors and contractors for store renovations, shelving installations, and signage updates
* Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and company policies.

**Reporting**

* Compile reports like sales figures, sales by category or genre, sales trends, and comparisons to previous periods regularly for management. (daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly)
* Generate inventory reports, and identify fast\-moving and slow\-moving titles
* Financial reporting (profit and loss, budget analysis, Administrative expenses, petty cash etc.).
* Customer feedback collection and reporting.
* Marketing and promotional effectiveness reporting.
* Compliance monitoring and reporting; ensuring compliance with company policies
* Operational reporting (store cleanliness, maintenance, customer service)

**Requirements:**

* A genuine passion for books and reading
* Proximity to Wuse II Abuja (This will be a deciding factor)
* Excellent customer service and communication skills
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team
* Basic computer skills for managing inventory and sales systems

**Benefits:**

* A friendly and supportive work environment
* Opportunities to discover new books and genres
* Staff discounts on books and merchandise

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₦150,000\.00 \- ₦200,000\.00 per month

Location:

* Abuja (Required)

Application Deadline: 28/02/2025  
Expected Start Date: 01/03/2025

title: Digital Engagement Officer
description:
**Digital Engagement Officer**

If you live and breathe marketing, we need to talk! We are looking for a versatile and result\-oriented Marketing specialist to be our Digital Engagement Officer.

Zest Entrepreneurship \& Leadership Academy (ZELA) is an integrated business support organization. Our aim is to provide scalable digitization with efficient support for our subsidiary businesses to grow.

As our Digital Engagement Officer, you will be an instrumental part of the team tasked with implementing marketing strategies that attract, nurture and ultimately convert. This position will be focused on the planning and execution of our digital advertising campaigns, search engine optimization, as well as the measurement and reporting of these activities from end\-to\-end.

**Responsibilities**

· Develop, implement, and track marketing programs such as email, social media, digital campaigns, other third\-party ad sources (such as editorial sites)

· Lead our online communication strategies, build community engagement, and enhance our brand’s digital presence.

· Manage our digital channels, creating engaging content, and fostering meaningful interactions with our audience.

· Collaborate with other internal teams (e.g. product and sales) to develop and monitor strategic marketing initiatives

· Analyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaigns

· Conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new marketing opportunities

· Monitor and respond to online conversations, ensuring timely and meaningful engagement with followers.

· Write, proofread, and edit creative and technical content across different mediums

· Work with external agencies and vendors to execute marketing programs

· Brainstorm and implement experiments and conversion tests

**Requirements**

· Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, business administration or similar field

· Proven experience in managing social media and digital engagement campaigns (2 years minimum).

· Strong content creation and copywriting skills, with an eye for visual storytelling.

· Familiarity with social media management tools, analytics platforms, and email marketing software.

· Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\-paced environment.

· Strong analytical skills to interpret engagement metrics and make data\-driven decisions.

· Proven experience in identifying target audiences and in creatively devising and leading across channels marketing campaigns that engage, educate and motivate

· Exceptional analytical and problem\-solving skills

· Strong time management and organizational abilities

Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and cover letter to: career@zelacademy.com

title: Funding and Partnership Officer
description:
**Funding and Partnership Associate**

Zest Entrepreneurship \& Leadership Academy (ZELA) is an integrated business support organization. Our aim is to provide scalable digitization with efficient support for our subsidiary businesses to grow, acquire funding and scale.

We are seeking a dynamic and strategic **Funding and Partnership Officer** to drive growth through securing funding and fostering meaningful partnerships with our customers. In this role, you will identify funding opportunities, apply for funding, build relationships with key stakeholders, and develop collaborative partnerships that align with our services. You will play a vital role in securing funding opportunities and establishing strategic partnerships that will drive the growth and success of our clients’ organizations.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Research and identify grants, donors, and funding sources to support projects.
* Develop compelling funding proposals, pitches, and presentations to secure funding opportunities.
* Build and manage relationships with partners, donors, sponsors, investors, and government agencies.
* Monitor and manage funding application processes, ensuring timely submissions.
* Collaborate cross\-functionally to align funding strategies with organizational objectives.
* Negotiate agreements, MOUs, and contracts and accelerator participation with external partners on behalf of clients
* Report on funding performance, partnerships, and KPIs regularly

· Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in fundraising and partnership development.

· Design and write strategy documents, concept ideas, annual impact report, and quarterly stakeholder report.

· Assist in organizing fundraising events and campaigns to support the organization's financial goals.

· Maintain a comprehensive database of funding prospects and partnership opportunities.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Business Development, communications, or related field.
* Proven experience in securing grants, fundraising, or partnership development.
* Strong networking, communication, and negotiation skills.
* Proficiency in proposal writing and presenting ideas effectively (written and verbal communication skills).
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and work in a fast\-paced environment.

· Detail\-oriented with exceptional organizational skills.

· Collaborative skills with internal teams to ensure accurate and timely reporting on funded projects.

· Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\-paced environment.

· Public Speaking and networking skills

· Proficiency in using fundraising software and databases is a plus.

If you are passionate about contributing to making a positive impact in our community through your expertise in funding and partnership development, we’d love to have you join our team!

Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and cover letter to: career@zelacademy.com

title: Field Sales Representative
description:
**SUMMARY**

We are looking to employ a sales\-driven and customer\-oriented sales officer to oversee and determine the most effective solutions to increase our company sales. The Filed Sales Representative’s responsibilities include recommending improvements to current sales strategies, informing potential and existing customers of company promotions, as well as working prospects through the entire sales cycle, including developing new leads, and turning interested shoppers into long\-term customers.

A Field Sales Representative’s daily activities vary from continually identifying sales opportunities, to creating sales presentations to B2C customers, to cold calling potential customers to generating leads.

To be successful as a sales representative, you should be persuasive and knowledgeable. Ultimately, an outstanding sales officer should have a strong work ethic and demonstrate exceptional communication, negotiation, and customer service skills at all times.

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

· · Selling and promoting products to both existing and potential customers

· Forecast sales, develop “out of the box” sales strategies/models and evaluate their effectiveness

· Upselling, answering questions, making recommendations, and providing exceptional customer service

· Use of various sales methods (door\-to\-door, cold calling, presentations etc) to acquire customer and meet revenue target

· You should be able to develop and implement effective sales strategies and sales target

· Addressing any customer queries and guiding them with their purchasing decisions

· Meet personal and team sales targets

· Attend meeting, sales events and trainings to keep abreast of the latest developments

· Report and provide feedback to management using financial statistical data, and customer needs or interests, potential new products, or services, and competitive activities

· Maintain and expand client database within your assigned territory

· Coordinating sales efforts with other departments

· Maintaining an accurate and detailed record of all sales expenses

· Preparing and presenting sales reports to the higher management

· Collaborating with the marketing department to develop various promotional activities

· Diverting customer requests and complaints to the relevant departments

**REQUIREMENTS**

· Bachelor's degree in business, marketing or a related field

· Proven work experience as a Sales Representative (Direct2Consumer desired)

· Proven record of personal quota

· Experience working with CRM and other related software

· Knowledge of different sales techniques and pipeline management

· Computer use competency

· Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company’s success

· Critical thinker and problem\-solving skills

· Team player

· Good time\-management skills

· Strong communication, negotiation and interpersonal skills

· Self\-motivated and driven

· Excellent customer service skills

If you are passionate about contributing to making a positive impact in our community through your expertise in sales and revenue growth, we’d love to have you join our team!

Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and cover letter to: career@soupah.kitchen

title: Store Operations Supervisor
description:
**SUMMARY:** 

The Store Operations Supervisor will work in our fast paced shop locations using leadership skills to manage all staff members and day\-to\-day grocery store operations, provide customer service, and solve problems as needed.

The store supervisor will work as a shift leader, directing the daily operations, ensuring compliance with company standards in all areas of operation including shelf arrangement, service delivery, customer relations, gadget maintenance, team management, inventory management, financial accountability, and other duties as required or assigned.

**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:** 

· **Operational Management**: Oversee and coordinate day\-to\-day store operations, ensuring smooth and efficient workflows.

· **Team Leadership**: Supervise, coach, and train a team of associates to meet performance and customer service standards.

· **Inventory Control**: Manage stock levels, coordinate stock orders, and oversee regular stock audits to ensure inventory accuracy.

· **Customer Experience**: Ensure a high standard of customer service is maintained, and address customer concerns promptly and professionally.

· **Compliance \& Safety**: Ensure store policies and procedures are followed, maintaining a safe and clean working environment that adheres to health and safety regulations.

· **Performance Reporting**: Track and report on store performance, including sales metrics, employee performance, and inventory control.

· **Problem Solving**: Address any operational issues or customer complaints in a timely and efficient manner, finding effective solutions.

· **Store Presentation**: Ensure the store is well\-organized, visually appealing, and consistently aligned with brand standards.

· **Collaboration**: Work closely with the Store Manager to identify opportunities for process improvements and contribute to strategic decision\-making.

**Requirements**

· Bachelor's degree in business administration or similar field

· Proven experience in retail operations, preferably in a supervisory or management role(minimum 1 year).

· Strong leadership abilities and the ability to motivate a team.

· Excellent organizational and time\-management skills.

· Strong customer service orientation and problem\-solving abilities.

· Ability to work in a fast\-paced environment and handle multiple priorities simultaneously.

· Knowledge of inventory management and retail systems.

· Strong communication skills, both verbal and written.

· Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion and professionalism.

If you are passionate about contributing to making a positive impact in our community through your expertise in operations management, we’d love to have you join our team!

Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and cover letter to: career@soupah.kitchen

title: Senior Clearing and Operations Officer
description:
1\. Send scan shipping documents to assigned clearing agent and update the system.

2\. Follow up the ETA \& ATA on daily basis for shipped orders \& update the system.

3\. Confirming that agent collected separate/original documents before arrival \& update the system.

4\. Confirm that all NAFDAC documents (valid online permit/NAFDAC certificate/CRIA/COA/MANUFACTURE) received by the agent. In addition, confirming that ORIGINAL EUC/SON/MSDS (if applicable) collected by the agent.

5\. Follow up rotation with shipping line before the vessel arrival by five days.

6\. Follow up with the Documentation Lead and make sure the scanned documents are sent to the bank mentioned in the FORM M in order to follow up for PAAR issuance.

7\. Follow up assessment notice with agent after receiving the rotation number.

8\. Check the draft assessment and confirm assessment.

9\. Preparing duty payment and secure duty receipt without delay and update the system and update the IDEC report.

10\. Checking destination with dispatch team.

11\. Check with finance funds availability or any other concerns if there is a delay in payment and update the system by mentioning the reason of delay.

12\. Follow up on the NAFDAC invoice with the clearing agent and obtain supervisor confirmation.

13\. Follow up NAFDAC FIRST STAMP (endorsement) with agent on daily basis and update the system.

14\. Follow up shipping line release and if any issue with shipping line, maintain a contact for prompt assistance and update on the system.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: From ₦250,000\.00 per month

We are seeking a skilled Medical Radiographer to join our healthcare team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for evaluating patients' health conditions, conducting diagnostic imaging procedures, and ensuring high\-quality patient care. You will operate advanced medical imaging equipment such as CT scanners, MRI scanners, and X\-ray machines.


* Minimum Qualification : Degree
* Experience Level : Entry level
* Experience Length : 1 year

### **Job Description/Requirements**

Responsibilities:


* Perform diagnostic radiographic procedures, including MRI, CT scans, X\-rays e.t.c
* Evaluate images for technical accuracy, ensuring proper patient identification and high\-quality results.
* Prepare patients for imaging procedures, ensuring comfort and safety throughout the process.
* Apply the ALARA (As Low As Reasonably Achievable) principle to minimize radiation exposure.
* Maintain accurate patient records and document all procedures performed.
* Assist physicians, oncologists, radiologists, and other healthcare professionals with imaging\-related patient care.
* Identify and respond to emergency situations swiftly and appropriately.
* Educate patients on pre\-procedure preparations and post\-procedure care.

Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations within the radiology department.

* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
* Proficiency in hospital management software and radiology information systems.
* Ability to work effectively under pressure while maintaining attention to detail.
* Strong critical thinking and problem\-solving abilities.
* Exceptional patient care and management skills.
* Ability to multi\-task and adapt to a fast\-paced healthcare environment.
* Commitment to maintaining patient confidentiality and ethical standards.
* Degree in Radiography or Medical Imaging Science from a recognized institution.
* Relevant certifications in medical radiography and imaging technology.
* Minimum of 1\+ years of experience in a diagnostic or hospital setting.
* Must be registered with the relevant professional bodies.

### **Job Summary**

Best Technologies is a fresh, fast\-growing digital agency in Nigeria. We’re all about empowering businesses with AI\-driven solutions—think software, mobile apps, websites, UI/UX design, digital marketing, and training. From our base in Ibadan, we’re building a team that’s innovative, collaborative, and ready to make waves in Africa and beyond. Join us to be part of something big from the ground up! We’re looking for an energetic and organized Admin/Customer Service Officer to join our small but mighty digital agency team. You’ll be the backbone of our operations—keeping things running smoothly behind the scenes and being the friendly face (and voice!) for our clients. If you love solving problems, enjoy a fast\-paced startup vibe, and want to grow with us, this is your chance.


* Minimum Qualification : OND
* Experience Level : Entry level
* Experience Length : 1 year
### **Job Description/Requirements**

**Responsibilities:**

**Administrative Duties:**

* **Office Management:** Keep our workspace tidy and stocked—manage supplies (e.g., stationery, snacks), coordinate repairs, and welcome visitors with a smile.
* **Documentation:** Maintain records (e.g., invoices, contracts) in Google Drive, update expense logs, and file physical copies when needed.
* **Scheduling:** Arrange team meetings, client calls, and training sessions using tools like Calendly and Google Calendar.
* **Support:** Assist with invoicing, expense tracking, and other admin tasks as we grow.

  

**Customer Service Duties:**

* **Client Communication:** Respond to inquiries (email, WhatsApp, phone) within 24 hours, escalate complex issues to the team, and send regular project updates.
* **On\-boarding Support:** Help new clients feel at home—send welcome emails, collect assets, and log details in HubSpot.
* **Satisfaction Check\-ins:** Follow up with clients post\-project, gather feedback, and report to the Team lead.
* **Problem\-solving:** Handle basic client requests or coordinate with the team for bigger fixes.

  

**Requirements:**

* Minimum of OND or HND in Business Administration, Office Management, or related field (BSc is a plus but not required).
* 1\-3 years in admin or customer service roles (startup experience is a bonus, but fresh talent with hustle is welcome!).
* Strong organization and multitasking—juggle tasks like a pro.
* Excellent communication—write and speak English clearly.
* Tech\-savvy—comfortable with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive), email, and learning new tools (e.g., HubSpot, Pumble).
* Problem\-solving—think on your feet and stay calm under pressure.
Friendly vibe—make clients and team feel valued.  
* 

  

**Nice\-to\-Haves:**

* Basic knowledge of AI tools or digital services (we’ll train you!).
Experience with invoicing or CRM.  
* 

  

**What We Offer:**

* Competitive compensation package
* Professional development opportunities
* Collaborative work environment
* Chance to shape the technical direction of a growing company
* Modern office space in Ibadan
Work with cutting\-edge technologies  
* 

  

**Location:** Ibadan (On\-site)


**How to Apply:** If you're ready to take the next step in your career and lead a team of talented engineers, we want to hear from you.  



  

Best Technologies Limited is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Prep Cook/Cook
description:
The Prep Cook/Cook is responsible for preparing high\-quality grilled and fried products using approved recipes and procedures. This role ensures food safety, hygiene, and timely delivery to maintain customer satisfaction while minimizing wastage.

Key Responsibilities:

\- Clean all kitchen equipment, accessories, and workstations thoroughly before beginning daily operations.

\- Take opening stock of raw materials and update inventory records accordingly.

\- Prepare raw materials, including mixing batters, seasoning, and grilling proteins.

\- Ensure raw materials are stored appropriately and follow FIFO (First In, First Out) and LILO (Last In, Last Out) methods to avoid spoilage and wastage.

\- Grill or fry products according to approved recipes and instructions provided by the offline order taker.

\- Monitor the grilling and frying process to ensure food is fully cooked, visually appealing, and meets quality standards.

\- Deliver timely preparation of meals to meet customer expectations.

\- Monitor and document stock levels of grilling/frying raw materials.

\- Notify the Shift Manager when stock levels fall below the pre\-agreed threshold to ensure uninterrupted operations.

\- Observe food safety and hygiene practices during all stages of food preparation.

\- Maintain cleanliness in the workstation and surrounding areas to meet health and safety regulations.

\- Work collaboratively with other team members to enhance branch profitability and operational efficiency.

\- Count and double\-check leftover stock at the end of the day.

\- Clean all equipment and workstations, adhering to the closing cleaning procedure.

\- Record daily activities, including stock usage, incidents, and feedback, in the designated records or portals.

\- Fill and submit daily reports sheet for review.

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

\- Deliver high\-quality, consistent work aligned with company standards.

\- Submit accurate and timely reports.

\- Meet or exceed monthly/quarterly sales targets.

\- Actively contribute to process improvement.

\- Compliance to SOPs, Processes, Policies, and Culture: Ensure adherence to all Standard Operating Procedures, company policies, and cultural practices.

\- Demonstrate comprehensive knowledge of all products/services offered.

\- Maintain strict hygiene standards and food safety practices in all operations.

\- Follow all recipes and approved processes accurately.

\- Minimize waste generated during production and adhere to set thresholds.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: From ₦60,000\.00 per month

Experience:

* cooking: 2 years (Required)

Application Deadline: 01/04/2025  
Expected Start Date: 15/04/2025

title: Area Collections Executive, Saki & Oyo (Oyo State)
description:
### **Description**

  

**Location:** Saki \& Oyo, Oyo State  

  

**About the role:**  

We are looking for diligent and well organized team member to join our Risk department as an Area Collections Executive. The Employee will drive the efforts and processes related to collections of our PAYG products in the field. They will also give advice and suggestions on how to improve customer payments and satisfaction while ensuring that the company offer matches end\-users expectations.### **What you would be expected to do**

  

* Assessing regional portfolio and repayment trends and laying down daily, weekly, and monthly strategies to drive better collection rates from delinquent customers.
* Conducting mystery market visits to confirm the quality of sales and obtain different insights from different areas to enhance strategic direction to mitigate situations of disabled lamps and repayments.
* Providing weekly updates to Sales and Risk Management teams on\-field interventions performed and results achieved, along with customer insights.
* Designing, piloting, and operationalizing collection processes necessary for ensuring better repayments and customer satisfaction.
* Working with Area Business Managers and Field Sales Executives to repossess products from delinquent customers in cases where direct intervention is required.
* Reporting any cases of product tampering observed in the field through the process and mechanism established by the Risk team.
* Facilitating reporting and actions to be taken against those perpetrating fraudulent practices in the field, such as product tampering, misinformed sales done by FSEs, etc., as per the processes laid out by the Risk function.
* Training Agents (Field Sales Executives) on dealing with repossessions and difficult customer collection issues.
* Driving operating rhythm to follow up with Agents (Field Officers) to ensure they are completing their collection calls and repossession tasks on time.
* Recruiting cash collection centers and setting up the critical collection area.

  

### **You might be a strong candidate if you**

  

* Have Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma related to Finance, Community Development, Communication, Credit Risk Management or related fields.
* Have at least 1 year of work experience in a similar position with field experience and also with rural customers settlements.
* Are excited about working in the field to drive collections, resolving issues, and enhancing the customer experience.
* Have strong experience from Microfinance/ Fintech or banking background on Credit Collections debt recovery preferable.
* Are good with numbers,
* Have good communication \& people skills
* Have clear thinking/problem\-solving ability.
* Are excited about working with rural customers \& resolve customers issues.
* Have excellent issue\-tracking and resolution skills.
* Are able to manage multiple tasks at the same time diligently and accurately.
* Work with multiple sales teams and cross\-functional teams seamlessly.
* Knowledge of the territory will be an added advantage.

  

### **What Sun King Offers**

  

* Professional growth in a dynamic, rapidly expanding, high\-social\-impact industry
* An open\-minded, collaborative culture made up of enthusiastic colleagues who are driven by the challenge of innovation towards profound impact on people and the planet.
* A truly multicultural experience: you will have the chance to work with and learn from people from different geographies, nationalities, and backgrounds.
* Structured, tailored learning and development programs that help you become a better leader, manager, and professional through the Sun Center for Leadership.

  

### **About Sun King**


Sun King is the world’s leading off\-grid solar energy company, combining cutting\-edge product design, fintech, and field operations to deliver energy access for the 1\.8 billion people who live without an affordable and reliable electric\-grid connection. Sun King has connected more than 20 million homes to solar power across Africa and Asia, adding over 200,000 homes each month.  

Sun King makes solar products affordable to low\-income households and businesses via ‘pay\-as\-you\-go’ purchase financing. Sun King installs solar after customers pay a small deposit. Customers then make small, manageable payments of as little as US $0\.11 a day via mobile money or cash.  

Instead of paying for expensive, polluting, and health\-damaging kerosene for lighting or diesel for power, customers unlock savings through accessing solar power and after one to two years of payments, customers own their solar equipment outright. To date, our Sun King solar products have saved customers more than $4 billion cumulatively.  

  

Sun King collects payments digitally through mobile money systems and its 28,000 field agents — over 650,000 payments each day. Embedded electronics inside each Sun King device regulate usage based on payments, similar to the operation of a pre\-paid mobile or electricity meter.  

From cost\-effective solar systems that provide home lighting and phone charging to robust solar inverters that can power high\-energy appliances such as laptops, computers, refrigerators, and more, effectively acting as a full stand\-in for grid power, Sun King’s products cater to a wide range of income segments and energy needs. Leveraging its proven distribution network and brand, Sun King is expanding its range of products and services to encompass clean cooking, electric mobility, entertainment, and more, aiming to address the needs of our underserved customers.
  

Sun King employs 2,800 full\-time staff in 12 countries, with specialties spanning product design, data science, logistics, customer service, sales, software, operations, and more — all with a passion to serve off\-grid families.  

Sun King is committed to gender diversity in the workplace. Women represent 44% of Sun King’s workforce.

title: Live Host/Presenter
description:
**Company:** Awalife Naija Limited  
**Location:** Ibadan, Nigeria  
**Employment Type:** Full\-Time  
**Workdays:** Monday – Saturday

**About the Role**

Awalife Naija Limited is seeking a vibrant, confident, and engaging **Live Host** to connect with our online audience through live streaming sessions. This role is ideal for individuals who enjoy being in front of the camera, interacting with people, and creating compelling digital content. As a Live Host, you will present, promote, and entertain viewers while ensuring maximum engagement and audience participation.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Host Live Sessions:** Conduct engaging live streams on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
* **Audience Engagement:** Interact with viewers, respond to comments, and encourage participation.
* **Brand/Product Promotion:** Showcase and endorse products, services, or campaigns in an engaging and persuasive manner.
* **Content Creation:** Develop innovative content ideas to retain and grow viewership.
* **Script \& Presentation Preparation:** Plan key talking points to ensure smooth and professional live sessions.
* **Collaboration:** Work closely with the production, marketing and content team to align live streams with promotional campaigns.
* **Monitor Performance:** Track engagement metrics and audience feedback to optimize future live sessions.

**Requirements:**

* **Education:**
* Minimum: **Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination (SSCE)** or equivalent.
* Desirable: **Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, or Higher National Diploma (HND)** in Media, Mass Communication, Theatre Arts, Marketing, or related fields.
* **Experience:**
* Prior experience as a host, presenter, social media influencer, brand ambassador, or public speaker is an advantage but not mandatory.
* **Skills \& Attributes:**
* **Confident and Charismatic** – Must have a lively, engaging, and energetic personality.
* **Excellent Communication Skills** – Ability to speak fluently and express ideas clearly.
* **Camera\-Friendly** – Comfortable presenting live and handling interactions in real time.
* **Social Media Savvy** – Familiar with live streaming and audience engagement on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.
* **Sales/Marketing Skills (Preferred)** – Ability to promote products and influence purchasing decisions.
* **Creativity \& Adaptability** – Ability to think quickly and handle unexpected challenges during live sessions.
* **Team Player** – Ability to collaborate with the marketing and production team.
* **Flexibility** – Available to work **Monday – Saturday**, including occasional evenings for special events.

**How to Apply:**

Interested candidates should send their **CV via indeed and prepare a short video introducing themselves** to **\[admin@awalife.com.ng]** with the subject line **"Application – Live Host"**.

**Why Join Us?**

✔ Be part of a **fast\-growing company**.  
✔ Opportunity to build a **personal brand and develop presentation skills**.  
✔ Work in an **exciting, interactive, and creative** environment.  
✔ **Career growth opportunities** in digital media, entertainment, and marketing.

Job Types: Full\-time, Contract

Location:

* Ibadan (Preferred)
